name: Mercury Thermostat Recycling Rebate
description: $30 mail-in rebate per mercury thermostat when recycled at designated drop-off location
fullDescription: Thermostat Recycling Corporation pays $30 per mercury thermostat recycled at designated drop-off locations, helping safely dispose of hazardous mercury while rewarding environmentally responsible behavior.
whatTheyOffer:
- $30 mail-in rebate per thermostat
- Proper disposal of hazardous mercury
- Multiple thermostats allowed per rebate
- Drop-off at participating HVAC contractors
- Drop-off at some home improvement stores
- Environmental benefit
howToGetIt:
1. Remove old mercury thermostat carefully
2. Find nearest drop-off location on website
3. Bring thermostat to designated location
4. Get receipt or confirmation of drop-off
5. Submit rebate form with documentation
6. Receive $30 rebate check per thermostat
